Presented by Ryan Pretlow  Methodist University  May 27-30, 2015  Texting with EX  Jenzabar’s Annual Meeting  May 27 - 30, 2015 Gaylord Opryland Resort & Convention Center  Nashville, TN © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.  About Me     Methodist University – Fayetteville, NC     Homegrown system     Went live with Jenzabar EX in July 2012     Systems Programmer turned JICS Administrator, Report Writer, Infomaker Trainer, Communications Management Trainer     Mom of 5     Figure Competitor     Group Exercise Instructor © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.     It is important to understand the communication management features in EX before configuring EX to send text messages, print letters, or send emails.     To learn about communication management, visit  www.myjenzabar.net   and download the very thorough manual.  Communication Management in EX © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.     To explain why text is a great form of communication     To provide a number of examples you can use texting through EX     To provide a general definition of merge documents     To explain the purpose and types of merge documents in EX     To define the data elements used to store mobile phone numbers, mobile carriers, and text opt-in     To demonstrate how we collect these data elements     To detail the setup of merge document definitions within EX that will send a text message.     To setup an action and relate to the text merge document     To add the newly created action to an action list  Session Objectives © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.     Text messages have a 97% open rate     83% of texts are read within 5 minutes of receiving     Mobile generates high response rates, 15%-20% as opposed to 1-4% through other media.  Why You Should Communicate Via Text  *** Statistics gathered from a 2014 US Survey report conducted by The Harris Poll on behalf of OneReach in August 2014. More details can be found at http://onereachcontactcenter.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/High-Demand-for-Customer-Service-via-Text-Message-2014-Report.pdf © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.     Notify candidates when their application or other documents have been received     Notify candidates when they’ve been accepted     Reminders regarding registration dates for select groups of students     Advertise campus events     Encourage students with balances to make payment arrangements     Financial aid deadline reminders  How You Could Use Texting in EX © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.     A product of the creation of multiple (and potentially large numbers of) documents from a single template form and a structured data source.     The communication may be sent out to many "recipients" with small changes, such as a change of address or a change in the greeting line. MS Word Mail Merge allows a user to send letters or documents to many people simultaneously; users simply create one document that contains the information that will be the same in each version, and then add placeholders for the information that will be unique to each version.  What is a Merge Document? © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.     You can use three types of merge documents to initiate the flow of communication within EX:  How are Merge Documents Used in EX? © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.     The text is sent as an email merge document type to the mobile device.     Each cell carrier has a domain to which you can send text messages as an email. For example, for Sprint, the domain is “@messaging.sprintpcs.com”.     To send an text message, you would concatenate the phone number with the domain. For example, to send a message to a Sprint customer, the “To:” in the email might read  9105555555@messaging.sprintpcs.com .  The Text is Actually an Email! © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.     Mobile phone number     Cell carrier for the mobile phone number     Domains for all cell carriers     Text Opt-In  Data Elements © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.  Data Elements: Mobile Phone © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.  Data Elements: Text Opt-In and Cell Carrier © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.  Populating the Cell Carrier Drop Down List     Create a new column name “cell_carrier” © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.     Add records for each cell carrier with the name of the carrier in Alternate Value 1 and an “@” plus the domain of the carrier  Populating the Cell Carrier Drop Down List © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.     Mobile phone, cell carrier, and text opt-in are gathered using three methods:  •   By candidates in our CFNC online application. The import utility maps these questions to the fields.  •   By candidates in our myMU (JICS) online application. The form builder mapping tools are used to direct the data into the fields.  •   By students through a form builder form on myMU. Students can also go to this form to opt-out of University text messaging if they wish.  How the Data Elements are Gathered © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.     “Communications Management”      “Merge Documents”     Right-click      “Add New”     After completing the letter, module/access, type, and description fields, save. Right-click on the newly created row and choose “Edit Document Definition”.  Create the Merge Document © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.  Merge Document Definition © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.  SELECT DISTINCT new_merge_id_file.id_num as id_num, name_master_a.last_name as  candidate_last_name,   name_master_a.first_name as candidate_first_name, name_master_a.preferred_name as candidate_preferred_name, convert(varchar,name_master_a.mobile_phone) + td.table_desc as email_address, candidate.counselor_initials, name_master_b.preferred_name as counselor_pref, name_master_b.last_name as counselor_last, name_master_b.email_address as counselor_email, name_master_b.email_address as email_from  FROM candidacy  LEFT JOIN name_master name_master_a ON candidacy.id_num = name_master_a.id_num  LEFT JOIN candidate on candidacy.id_num = candidate.id_num  LEFT OUTER JOIN counselor_responsi ON candidate.counselor_initials = counselor_responsi.counselor_initials  LEFT JOIN name_master name_master_b ON counselor_responsi.id_num = name_master_b.id_num  LEFT JOIN TABLE_DETAIL TD ON name_master_a.UDEF_5A_1 = TD.TABLE_VALUE AND TD.COLUMN_NAME = 'cell_carrier'  INNER JOIN new_merge_id_file on candidacy.ID_NUM = new_merge_id_file.ID_NUM  Query Behind r_mail_merge_data_text_2 © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.
